pkgmetadata.longdescription: Physrisk==============================Physical risk calculation engine.```pip install physrisk-lib```Access to hazard event data requires setting of environment variables specifying the S3 Bucket, for example:```OSC_S3_BUCKET=physrisk-hazard-indicatorsOSC_S3_ACCESS_KEY=**********6IOSC_S3_SECRET_KEY=**********mS```For use in a Jupyter environment, it is recommended to put the environment variables in a credentials.env file and do, for example:```from dotenv import load_dotenvload_dotenv(dotenv_path=dotenv_path, override=True)```
